userStories.title: Codebase Audit: Refactor functions/src/index.ts types
userStories.description: Replace all 'any' types with strict Zod schemas and TypeScript interfaces for type safety
acceptanceCriteria: All external data validated through Zod schemas

userStories.title: Codebase Audit: Refactor src/App.tsx types
userStories.description: Replace all 'any' types with strict Zod schemas and TypeScript interfaces for type safety
acceptanceCriteria: Component state uses proper TypeScript types

userStories.title: Safety Layer: Implement Zod validation in backend
userStories.description: Add runtime validation for all external API data using Zod schemas
acceptanceCriteria: YouTube API responses validated through Zod
CoinCap API responses validated through Zod
News feed data validated through Zod
Invalid data shows 'Data Unavailable' instead of crashing

userStories.title: Safety Layer: Add idempotency for trade execution
userStories.description: Implement idempotency keys to prevent duplicate trade orders
acceptanceCriteria: Same order cannot be processed twice

userStories.title: Model Verification: Verify Gemini Pro/Flash allocation
userStories.description: Ensure Gemini 3.0 Pro is used for complex reasoning and Flash for high-volume tasks
acceptanceCriteria: Master Strategy Engine uses Pro model

userStories.title: UI Polish: Dashboard and chat panel review
userStories.description: Ensure Google Finance aesthetic and proper use of MD3 design system variables
acceptanceCriteria: All colors use MD3 variables from index.css
No hardcoded hex codes except in design system
